com.github.glusk2.sprouts.core.geom

Class PolylinePiece

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.glusk2.sprouts.core.geom.PolylinePiece
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Polyline

    public final class PolylinePiece
extends Object
implements Polyline
    A PolylinePiece is a piece of the original Polyline, that is cut in two at the cuttingPoint.

    pieceFlag indicates which half this PolylinePiece represents (true - the first half, false - the second half).

    If the cuttingPoint is not on the original Polyline, points() returns an empty list.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.github.glusk2.sprouts.core.geom.Polyline

        Polyline.WrappedList

    • Constructor Detail

      • PolylinePiece

        public PolylinePiece(Polyline original,
                     Vector2 cuttingPoint)
        Constructs the second half PolylinePiece from original that is cut at the cuttingPoint, using the default segment intersect error.

        Equivalent to: 

         new PolylinePiece(original, cuttingPoint, false);
        Parameters:
        original - the Polyline to cut
        cuttingPoint - the point at which to cut original

      • PolylinePiece

        public PolylinePiece(Polyline original,
                     Vector2 cuttingPoint,
                     boolean pieceFlag,
                     float segmentIntersectError)
        Constructs the specified PolylinePiece from original that is cut at the cuttingPoint.
        Parameters:
        original - the Polyline to cut
        cuttingPoint - the point at which to cut original
        pieceFlag - a flag that indicates which half this PolylinePiece represents (true - the first half, false - the second half)
        segmentIntersectError - maximum error margin for detection of intersection between a polyline segment and point
